Text.Page:
? I never thought I'd see you here!

I came here to investigate the suspicious teleportal.
I wasn't expecting such a large hatchery. With so many larvae, there was little I could do on my own.
It's a big relief that you're here, <PCNAME>. Let's get rid of them!<TEXTBUTTON>"It'll be my pleasure."</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>Start event.</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
